# ui-radio



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Custom styled radio option (NOT using native radio input)

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute   | Description                    | Type                           | Default     |
| -------------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `disabled`           | `disabled`  | Whether this radio is disabled | `boolean`                      | `false`     |
| `indicator`          | `indicator` | Indicator style                | `"check" \| "custom" \| "dot"` | `'dot'`     |
| `value` _(required)_ | `value`     | Value for this radio option    | `string`                       | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot            | Description                                     |
| --------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
|                 | Default slot for label content                  |
| `"description"` | Optional description text below label           |
| `"indicator"`   | Custom indicator icon (when indicator="custom") |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
